single.searchString: index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" (TemplateName="256_INGRESS" OR TemplateName="257_EGRESS") | `JOIN_ICA_USER_NAME($observerId$)` | where userName != "" | stats distinct_count(userName)
index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" (TemplateName="256_INGRESS" OR TemplateName="257_EGRESS") | `JOIN_ICA_ALL_TIME($observerId$)` | stats distinct_count(appName)
index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" `ICA_TEMPLATES` | stats count BY `CONNECTION` | stats count

chart.title: HDX WAN Throughput
chart.searchString: index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" (TemplateName="256_INGRESS" OR TemplateName="257_EGRESS") (flowId=1 OR flowId=4) | join type=inner `CONNECTION` [ search index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" `ICA_TEMPLATES` (flowId=1 OR flowId=4) | fields `CONNECTION` ] | eval sent=if(flowId==4, octetDeltaCount, 0) | eval received=if(flowId==1, octetDeltaCount, 0) | eval sent = `BYTES_TO_MBITS(sent)` | eval received = `BYTES_TO_MBITS(received)` | timechart per_second(sent) AS "Sent" per_second(received) AS "Received"

chart.title: Avg WAN Latency(RTT) By Top User
chart.searchString: index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" TemplateName="257_EGRESS" flowId=4 roundTripTime>=0 | `JOIN_ICA_USER_NAME($observerId$)` | stats avg(roundTripTime) AS "WAN Latency" by userName | sort -num("WAN Latency") | head 10

chart.title: Avg WAN Latency(RTT) By Top Application
chart.searchString: index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" TemplateName="257_EGRESS" flowId=4 roundTripTime>=0 | join type=inner `CONNECTION` [search index=cloudbridge observationPointId="$observerId$" `ICA_TEMPLATES` | fields `CONNECTION`] | stats avg(roundTripTime) AS rtt_conn values(appName) as appName by `CONNECTION` | `ICA_APP_NAME_FIX(appName)` | stats avg(rtt_conn) AS "WAN Latency" by appName | sort -num("WAN Latency") | head 10
